author: mturk
msg: Use socklen_t for getsockopt param instead int.

msg: added installation description. fixed a couple of bugs in rpetstore.

author: mturk
msg: Add jk_sock_t that is SOCKET on WIN32 and int on POSIX.
This enables to deal with newest Microsoft PSDKs where
SOCKET is defined as unsigned int pointer.
Also added macros for testing the socket instead simply
